title: Prionoderita
text: Prionoderita is a genus of <a href="leaf%20beetle">leaf beetle</a>s in the subfamily <a href="Eumolpinae">Eumolpinae</a>. It is known from <a href="Bolivia">Bolivia</a>, and contains only one species, Prionoderita nixa. The genus is named for its resemblance to "<a href="Prionodera">Prionodera</a>"; the <a href="Spanish%20language">Spanish</a> diminutive suffix "-ita" refers to the small size of "P. nixa", which has a length of 6.5 mm.
